FAQs

Are you open to equity deals?

Yes, I have an advisory/co-founder model that includes equity. See my Advisory & Co-Founder Services page for details.

What if I’m on a limited budget?

I offer smaller engagements focused on initial Discovery or MVP validation. Let’s chat to see if we’re a good fit.

Do you handle ongoing support?

Yes. Check out Optimization Services for monthly retainers.
